com.jova.calculator

Class CalculatorTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jova.calculator.CalculatorTest

  • public class CalculatorTest
extends java.lang.Object

    CalculatorTest

    CalculatorTest is a testing class that fully covers all of the code implemented in Calculator class. Tests are parametrized and are using Hamcrest matchers.
    Since:
    2020-12-23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Srdjan Jovic

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Calculator calculator
      Calculator object that is referenced in all test methods.
      private static java.lang.Double DELTA
      Delta value that is used to allow approximation of double values in testing, set to expect at least the first 14 decimals to match.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CalculatorTest()

      • testCalculator

        @Test
public void testCalculator()

      • testAdditionParameterized

        @ParameterizedTest
 @MethodSource(value="additionParameters")
public void testAdditionParameterized(char operator,
                                                                                                      java.lang.Double currentValue,
                                                                                                      java.lang.Double value,
                                                                                                      java.lang.Double result)
                                                                                               throws NotSupportedOperationException,
                                                                                                      DivisionByZeroException
        Tests the addition calculation for the calculate method, parametrized to consume parameters from additionParameters method.
        Parameters:
        operator - Calculation operator.
        currentValue - Calculator requested current value.
        value - Second operand for calculate method.
        result - Expected result for the calculation.
        Throws:
        NotSupportedOperationException
        DivisionByZeroException
